name: Spacey (JikkeJ, Hertog, Trashcandogchoir)
description:
Spacey is a game where you use your scanner to listen for signals from broken satelites in order to find and repair them, but beware! Whenever you turn your scanner on, every alien will hear you and rush towards you and you cannot thrust or strafe, and can only turn slowly. 

If you turn your scanner off you will become invisible to the aliens. Conversely, you can only see the satellites while the scanner is turned on.

Once you have located a satellite, fly up to it and activate the scanner for 3 seconds to repair it.

Controls:

Scanner - Hold Space

Turn - Mouse

Thrust forward -W

Thrust reverse - S

Strafe - A / D

Boost - Left Shift

Game created by:

Jan van der Weide - Code & Level Design
Jonas Pannee - Code & SFX
Damir Pejinovic - Art & Graphics
Dodo Hjelm - Art & Graphics
Jikke de Vries - Art & Graphics 
Matilda M - Art & Graphics

Game was finished on the 24th of February, For the "International Educations Game Jam 2022
